amendment.description: Amendment deletes the last sentence of section 3090 dealing with the Roanoke River Upper Basin, Virginia, flood control project that states that the Secretary shall award contracts based on invitation-for-bid procedures.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Duncan amendment (A005) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Duncan.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Duncan amendment (A005) Agreed to without objection.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Duncan amendment (A005) Agreed to without objection.
